msbt.message: I feel like we could know each other a little better, don't you? You up for a little Q&A?
I should really be getting to know people here a little better, starting with you. Am I right or am I right? I'm right.
Let's see, Where should we begin
So, you said that when it comes to , you're a big fan of . Correct?

Alright, I'm glad I've got that straight, .See, when I was chatting with , the topic of came up. And I may have mentioned your preference. You know, for !So, yeah, I might be nosy, but at least I'm accurate. Ha HA!
So, you said that when it comes to , you're an expert on . Right?

Alright, I'm glad I've got that straight, .See, when I was chatting with , the topic of came up. And I may have mentioned your preference. You know, for !So, yeah, I might be nosy, but at least I'm accurate. Ha HA!
Tell me if I'm wrong... If we're talking , you're super into , right?
Well that's a relief!See, I sorta let it slip when I was chatting with and came up. I dropped your name and suddenly I was going on and on about !I hope you don't mind, .

Yeah, yeah. Obviously! Of course I knew that...In fact, I mentioned your interest in to during a recent hang. I was going on and on about and your famously pristine taste. It's important to keep up one's reputation, you know. What I'm trying to say is...you're welcome.
I wanna rehash something with you. Your life goal is to become . Am I right?

So I wasn't just imagining that conversation then, .The deal is I was chatting with recently and we landed on the topic of dreams. And I might have mentioned that your dream is to become . We both thought it was a match made in heaven. So if you ever have doubts, remember... approves!
So, your unofficial biography would probably be titled "World's Best ," yeah?

I had a gut feeling I was right about that, .Earlier, and I were discussing and your name came up. Well, not your name so much as your - themed dream!You know, I pride myself on my memory, . As well as my collection of crushed velvet slippers.
Soare you still known for your love of , or am I just making that up?

So then I didn't totally step my foot in it, .I was telling how you turned me onto . Then it occurred to me—I haven't checked in with any of my go-to influencers for, like, 10 minutes! I just had to make sure you hadn't already moved on to something like , you know?
Soare you still known for your love of , or am I just making that up?

So then I didn't totally step my foot in it, .I was telling how you turned me onto . Then it occurred to me—I haven't checked in with any of my go-to influencers for, like, 10 minutes! I just had to make sure you hadn't already moved on to something like , you know?
Now, I hear you have a special touch when it comes to it comes to ... Isn't that right?

When I'm good, I'm good. Great, even, ! and I were comparing selfies the other day and got to talking about other life skills. Of course I mentioned that you are, like, amazing at .If I could master like you did with , the world would be my
Now, I hear you have a special touch when it comes to ... Isn't that right?

When I'm good, I'm good. Sometimes amazing, ! and I were brainstorming hashtags and got to talking about other important skills. Of course I mentioned how good you are at .If I could master like you mastered that, the world would be my
You know how some folks pretend that they don't like to gossip?<10_4 /> Ha! I'm up front. I love gossip! SoI heard this from someone on
The rumor has it that when it comes to , you're kind of obsessed with .
I totally get it. I'm also obsessed with !I can't believe we ended up on the same island. Two celebrities, both bonkers for We should definitely turn this into a TV show somehow
I gotta say, I don't know much about . But that's OK—you do you, .
The rumor has it that when it comes to , you're kind of obsessed with .
I totally get it. I'm also obsessed with !I can't believe we ended up on the same island. Two celebrities, both fans We should definitely turn this into a TV show somehow
I gotta say, I don't know much about .But that's OK—you do you, . Ha HA!
OK, so this might just be a rumor, but I hear you're into , or more specifically .

You won't hear any disagreement from me! I've devoted way too many hours to . You knowever since coming to this island, I've been looking for someone to mentor and take under my wing. You might just have what it takes. Anyway, think about it, .
Huh. I've been meaning to check out , but maintaining my lifestyle blog is a full-time job. But yeah, I'll be all over once things slow down, .
OK, so this might be a rumor, butI hear you're into , or more specifically , right?

You won't hear any disagreement from me! I've devoted so many hours to . You knowever since coming to this island, I've been looking for someone to mentor and take under my wing. You might just have what it takes. Anyway, think about it, .
Huh. I've been meaning to check out , but maintaining my lifestyle blog is a full-time job. But yeah, I'll be all over once things slow down, .
A little bird may or may not have told me that you dream of one day becoming .
That's so cool! It's definitely on the list of things I'd like to become as well. In addition to the rather lengthy list of things that I already am. Ha HA!
I gotta say, I don't know much about being .But that's OK—stick with it, . Ha HA!
The rumor is that your dream for the future could be summed up as "."
That's so cool! It's definitely on the list of things I'd like to become as well. In addition to the rather lengthy list of things that I already am. Ha HA!
I gotta say, I don't know much about .But that's OK—follow your bliss, . Ha HA!
The rumor is that your favorite hobby is . Yeah?

Whoa! It's like I'm staring into a mirror! I am also a huge fan of , . And here I thought I was going to be the only tastemaker on this island. I've never been happier to be wrong! Anyways, I'd love to discuss sometime soon. Perhaps over brunch
To be honest, I've never quite gotten the appeal of .But if you're into it, it must be worthwhile, .
The rumor is that your favorite hobby is . Yes?

Whoa! It's like I'm staring into a mirror! I am also a huge fan of . And here I thought I was going to be the only tastemaker on this island. I've never been happier to be wrong! Anyways, I'd love to chat about . Perhaps over brunch
To be honest, the appeal of has never been clear to me. But if you're into it, it must be worthwhile, .
Word on the street is that you're super good at . Is that true, ?
Whoa, that's cool! Some folks make a living from , did you know? I definitely want to hear more. And I can tell you all about my special skill!
Yeah, I can't see a future for myself in I'm gonna stick to what I know best— personal branding!
Word on the street is that you've got crazy skills when it comes to . Is that true, ?
Whoa, that's cool! Some folks make a living doing that, did you know? Pro ! I definitely want to hear more. And I can tell you all about my special skill!
Yeah, I can't see a future for myself in I'm gonna stick to what I know best— personal branding!
That's not true now. That's incorrect.
So, you're not too interested in books, and you don't have a favorite. Is that right, ?
That's not true now. That's incorrect.
You and comic books are like oil and my T-zone, right?Not friends, !
That's not true now. That's incorrect.
What's the deal with you and movies? I hear you're not much of a cinephile, .
That's not true now. That's incorrect.
I hear you don't watch a lot of TV shows Or was it that you don't have a TV of your own Or do you just not know what TV is, ?
Uh, the first one. All of the above.
That's not true now. That's incorrect.
I got the impression that sports are kind of a non-starter for you. Do you even have a favorite, ?
So, you're not too picky about what you drink and you don't have a fave. Is that right, ?
That's not true now. That's incorrect.
I hear you'll eat almost anything! Does that mean favorite foods just aren't a thing for you, huh?
That's not true now. That's incorrect.
You haven't found any one thing that you're driving toward yet. Is that true, ?
That's not true now. That's incorrect.
People say you're one of those rare characters who can exist without a hobby, . Is there some truth to that?
That's not true now. That's incorrect.
According to the latest, you don't think any one of your skills really stands out above the rest. Do I have it right, ?
That's not true now. That's incorrect.
Alright, thanks for setting the record straight, . Glad I went right to the source!
No? Well, I guess that's why it's called a rumor.
Let me just make sure I heard that right. You said , yeah?
That's not right. Wait a second...
Hey, take your time! Now, what was that again?
Oh! So you really are a fan of , huh?
Oh! So you really are a fan of , huh?
Ah! Then you really do get a craving for ?
Ah! Then you really do get a craving for ?
Huh? So you do dream of becoming ?
Oh! So your favorite hobby really IS , huh?
Oh! So I had it right the first time. , yeah?
Hold on! So you really ARE super good at ?
Wait! So I did have it the first time. With ?
Interesting Good to know all my intel holds up, .When you can't trust the local rumor mills, you know things are going downhill and fast. But I'm glad to hear what I heard was worth hearing.
Ah! I've got it. What's your favorite kind of music?
Oh, really? Yeah, I guess it makes sense that your tastes would change over time. So, thenwhat kind of music do you like to listen to now?
OK, then What kind of music do you ACTUALLY listen to?
No way! I'm a jazz myself, !Yeah, whenever I'm feeling blue, I throw on a vintage record and let the horns and bass do their thing. I've been listening to records ever since it became uncool.
For real? I'm a samba myself, !The way the rhythm just washes over meit's like I can't stop dancing once I start! It's so cool that we have this in common. Samba party at my place soon! Ha HA!

Whoa, I'm a huge fan of cartoon theme songs too!When I hear the first few notes of those opening themes, it's like nostalgia overload We should totally do cartoon karaoke together sometime. Is that a thing? Ha HA!
OK, I think I've got it. .Hey, if you like it, I'll definitely give it a listen. Thanks!
Hey, nothing wrong with that. Some of my favorite sounds aren't music either. You know, like the sound my favorite vest makes when I button itor the sound of my fans cheering Ha HA!
So then, what books do you like to read?
Yeah, I'm always into the latest, trendiest thing too. Sowhat kind of books are you into now?
Well, then What kind of books are you reading these days?

Ha! I love coffee-table books too! They're so big and important looking.And you can learn a lot of ice- breaking conversation starters by actually reading the content. For instance, did you know that humans can't digest grass? They don't have enough stomachs! Oh! Sorry, I forgot. YOU'RE a human. Right, rightUmif I ever serve at a party, you may want to steer clearThe secret ingredient is grass. It's, like, 80 percent grass, .

What are the chances? Magazines are my preferred form of literature too, !Where else can you find the latest grooming trends AND the best way to break into the scented-candle biz. Speaking of, let me know if you ever want to chat wax.

Isn't that funny? I'm also an essay enthusiast, .Each one is like a little diary entry from the author They feel almost scandalous to read! Let me know if you ever have any recommendations. If you like something, it's gotta be good.
. There. Committed to memory.If it's got your stamp of approval, I'm sure it's epic.
Yeah, I get it. Books take way too long to read.That's why I invented a new looping video service!Because if you can't tell your story in two seconds or less, are you even really an author?
Hey, what kind of comics do you like to read, ?
Yeah, people's tastes change I guess. So what kind of comics currently grace your shelves?
So tell me about the types of comics you do read, .

Guess what! I am also a mystery aficionado, ! I literally can't put 'em down! Sometimes I'll pick up a mystery at bedtime, and the next thing I know, the sun is up, ! The only downside is the giant circles that show up under my eyesEh, nothing a little raspberry- scented face mask can't fix.

Well, well, well. We've got another romantic on this island after all!Actually, we better keep this little coincidence to ourselves. OK, ? My celebrity is kinda rooted in that cool, aloof persona I've developed. You know what I'm talking about.

That's a little eerie. I'm into sci-fi comics too! How cool is that, ?I'm not sure what I like more—the otherworldly drama and vivid characterization sci-fi delivers Or the escape it provides from the constant selfie-taking and social media farce my life has become. HAHA! Just kidding! I LOVE my life! Ah, I really got you there, didn't I? Oh, . So gullible!
Interesting If you're a fan, then I'll have to investigate this thing. Who knows? Maybe this time next year, we'll be co-founders of the fan club.
Makes sense, .You're the type that wants to live in the present and experience things first-hand, I guess. Me? I'm always looking ahead. How else am I gonna discover the next big thing?
Huh. Good to know, .So tell me, . What's the hot, new genre to watch?
That was an intriguing twist. Well, what kind of movies do you watch?

Ah, yes. There's nothing quite as powerful as a good romance, is there, ? Sometimes I wish real life was more like the movies, . Exciting, dramatic, enthralling! Actually, that does sound a lot like my day-to-day.

I'm in complete agreement! When given a choice, I always go for the biopic, . I love getting a peek into the private life of someone I admire or look up to. I can only hope one day the biopic about me will be just as titillating!

I thought I recognized another horror fan! Just like you, I'm always after a thrill, . I wonder why it is that I am so fascinated by stories in which someone almost meets their doom Eh, let's not read too much into it, .
So I should check out ?<10_4 /> Done!<10_4 /> Well, not literally. Now if you'll excuse me, I have a movie marathon to get to.
Oh, then maybe you're the type of person who prefers the theatre of life over theatrical releases. That's not a bad thing. You are the star of your own story, after all.
I've been wondering something, . What's your favorite thing to watch on TV?
Oh really? I don't know how I missed this. So then what kind of TV shows are you into now, ?
What kinds of TV shows DO you watch, ?

No way, ! Watching the news is one of my favorite past times too! It's important as residents of to keep up with the latest happenings in the world. I keep waiting to see my name in the headlines, but so far⁠, nada.
What a coincidence! I love a good television drama, !Sometimes I'll start binging a show and before I know itI haven't seen the sun in three days! I can't help it, ! I NEED to know what happens next!
You know who else likes anime, ? Me!I've been watching anime for as long as I can remember. I wouldn't say that I'm the one that made it cool But you should feel free.
Then it's settled. I'm gonna check out now.Perfect timing. My repertoire of TV shows is in dire need of a refresh.
You don't watch TV? Seriously?So, what Do you just use yours as a table or something? Or maybe some kind of conversation piece? Sorry, I'm going to need a minute here, .
What sports do you follow or play, ? I'm curious.
Huh. I'm surprised to hear that. I thought I had you all figured outSo what kind of sports are you into these days?
So what kind of sports are you into, then?

Seriously, ? Tennis is also MY favorite sport!That's the one with the rackets and the nets, right? Oh, and I love those bright and fuzzy tennis balls! They're so cute! Yep. That decides it. Tennis is definitely the best sport.

That's funny! I'm also a golf enthusiast, !What's not to love? Epic landscapes, long walks, the unique challenge that each hole provides Who am I kidding? I just like the outfits. I can't help that I look good in a silly hat, !

Track and field? You're speaking my language, !I run laps around every day to keep my mind sharp and my body in shape. When that starring role in the next big action franchise comes along, I've gotta be ready!
You've certainly piqued my interest in .It's not every day you get introduced to a brand-new sport, .I can't wait to say that I was into before it was cool.
Eh, don't worry about it. Having a favorite sport is an overrated pleasure, .
If you were living on a desert island and could only have one drink, what would it be, ? Huh, I guess this question is oddly appropriate...
Really? How did I miss that?I know you're always on the lookout for something fresh and new in the world of beverages, . So what's your new fave?
So now what would you consider your drink of choice, ?

Oh, I love coffee too. The trajectory of my whole day is determined by that first cup, . It's all about the routine. Grind the beans. Heat the water. Brew!Once that warm, earthy smell fills the room, it's time to get out there and take on the world!

Mmm A cup of tea would hit the spot right now, . But what kind do I want? Herbal teas are so calming and really mellow me out.On the other hand, one cup of black tea and I'm bouncing off the walls!And don't get me started on green tea,

Same here! What's your favorite flavor combo, ?Personally, I'll drink anything with passion fruit in it, .I used to feel that way about , but I had to start switching it up after moving to this island!
Thanks for the tip! I'll pour myself some ASAP, . I feel good knowing that every sip will be -approved!

I understand. Finding the perfect drink can be a daunting task.Too hot and you burn your tongue. Too cold and you get a brain freeze!If only there was a drink that could be enjoyed at room temperatureNote to self⁠—draft business plan for my next venture Lukewarm beverages!
I've got a life-altering question for you, . Ready?Whatis your favorite food?
Ha! I thought as much! Then let me ask⁠—what has your taste buds firing lately, ?
Now I'm curious to know what your favorite food really is, .

Ah, french fries. A classic choice, . You knowI believe you can tell a lot about someone's personality type based on the fries they like to eat. The straight fry is the fry of the ingénue⁠—simple, elegant, and unseasoned to the ways of the world. The potato wedge? Now that's the fry of the anti-hero, .Salty and crispy on the outside, but deep down they're just mush. And then there's the waffle fry. It's sturdy, flavorful, and disarmingly attractive. The leading man of fries, you might say. Does that remind you of anyone?

Bellisimo! I could talk pasta with you all day, !I hear that homemade pasta's making a comeback, and anyone who's anyone has their own pasta maker. I've been trying to get one for my kitchen for weeks, but so far no one's responded to my ad. Know any pasta makers looking for work, ?

Did you say chocolate? That's my guilty pleasure too, !What's better than an evening spent in a warm bubble bathsipping on a cup of hot chocolate And munching on expensive truffles and chocolate delightsWhat? Self-care is a key component of a healthy lifestyle!

Mmm... Sounds good. I know what my next meal is going to be.A little , with a side of delicious
Topped with even more !What can I say? When I commit to something, I commit.
I'm surprised to hear that. But to be honest, I'm a little jealous.Your favorite food is out there somewherejust waiting to be eaten. How exciting, !
What kind of career do you see for yourself, ?You know, if our artisan waffle stand doesn't work out
Is that so? I'm glad I never got you one of those themed novelty mugs then, ! So what is your current dream job?
Now that that's all cleared up, what do you want to be in the future?

No way! I dream of becoming a world-famous fashion designer too!Oh wait. I guess you didn't say "world-famous," did you?Who are we kidding, ? I'm pretty sure international stardom is everyone's end goal.

For realsies? I also dream about becoming a teacher! But not one of those boring, regular teachers. I would be like one of those cool teachers you see in the movies.You know, the type that wears jeans to class and sits backwards on a chair, . I want to teach kids how to establish your personal brand, properly tie a cravat, cry on cue The stuff they'll really need when they're out in the real world.

This must be fate! I'm also an aspiring musical phenomenon!And I just so happen to be looking for potential new members for my band, ! We've already got a manager, a publicist, a stylist, and a name— Revolution! All we need now is someone with musical talent, .
Yes! Everything about you screams !Obviously, you have my full support. Because what's behind every starry-eyed kid with a dream?An aspiring actor slash entrepreneur slash lifestyle guru.
Know what I think? Maybe you just haven't realized what your dream is just yet, But until you do, I'm always in need of a good personal assistant.
I'm trying to pick up a new hobby, but I'm all out of ideas. I need some serious inspiration. Tell me⁠—what keeps you busy?

That's what I was hoping you'd say, ! You're kind of known as a master of leisure around here. An icon in the field of passing the time! A pioneer who turned relaxation into an art! A genius⁠— You get the point.So, anyway. What's the next hobby craze going to be, ?
Does that mean you have another hobby or interest?

You're into the guitar too? I knew there was a reason I liked you, ! Don't you agree that the guitar is the coolest instrument? I feel cooler just holding one. I can only imagine how awesome I'll look once I learn to play it

No way, ! I'm also a huge fan of anime!I even considered pursuing a career as an anime voice actor, but alasDon't get me wrong, I would've been great. A legend, !I just didn't want my talents to distract from the true star of the genre⁠—the storytelling.

You dabble in photography as well? I can't believe I'm just learning about this now, ! A lot of photographers will obsess over the right type of camera and which lens to use. But as long as your artwork has heart, you can't go wrong. Well, heartand a good model.
This thing is new to me! But if you're a fan, I'm a fan.
Huh. Well you always seem pretty busy to me, .So as long as you're doing what makes you happy, keep doing it!
There's a rumor I might be tapped to produce an island-wide talent show for . I'm trying to get a sense of the local talent. Got any special skills?
Oh yeah? I guess it is one of those skills that requires a lot of practice.What have you been working on instead, ?
Anyway, are you hiding any other special skills, ?
Oh yeah? You dance? I dance! Doesn't matter if it's rock, salsa, or heavy metal, . The minute that music touches my ears, my feet hit the dance floor!

You play the guitar? Wow! I'm impressed, !I'd love to be able to strum a few tunes, but I don't have the patience for all that practice. I'm waiting to find a hobby that has that one quality I desire Instant gratification!

Ah, a fellow magician? That does explain the mysterious aura you have about you, . But I'm glad to have you in the fold. We need more people like you and me, . You knowif we're going to make magic cool again!
Well, I've never heard of . ManI go screen-free for one day and look what happens! It's like I've been gone for five years! What else are the cool people doing these days?
I don't buy it. Someone as awesome as you definitely has a special skill or two to brag about. One thing's for sure—you're a pro at being modest. And I should know I'm amazing at that too.
